actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that the recently enacted provisions authorizing increases in the salaries of Senators and Representatives be limited only to the increase which will take effect October 1, 1975.

summary.text: Limits specified provisions of the Legislative Reorganization Act authorizing increases in the salaries of Senators and Representatives only to the increase which will take effect October 1, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the recently enacted provisions authorizing increases in the salaries of Senators and Representatives be limited only to the increase which will take effect October 1, 1975.
